Package gameComponents

Class Player

java.lang.Object
gameComponents.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Class that represents a player. This is the actor of the game, because it represents the user, with two different characteristics: a name and a token. This class presents useful methods for getting and setting these characteristics.
Author:
andre
